column3: Flexible strategy focused around a healthy economy while still keeping up in levels. General rules are Level 6 by 3-2, Level 7 by 4-1, and Level 8 by 5-1.
Save up and then 3-star units at 3-1 by rolling all your gold.
3-star units at level 6 by rolling all your gold every round.
3-star units at level 7 by rolling all your gold every round.
The goal is to reach level 8 early in Stage 4 to find 4 and 5 cost units before your oppoonents. You genreally need long win or losestreaks to have enough gold for it.
